channel.title: Comments on: The Dream of One Thousand (* 80) Cranes
channel.description: iOS Frameworks for speech recognition, text to speech and more

item.title: By: happy
item.dc:creator: happy
item.description:
when I see the butterfly, I didn't think it is a butterfly. I thought it was some small dinosaur or T-rex is opening its mouth, showing its teeth. haha. different point of view I guess.
anyway, cool blog, mixing birds and code all over the place. if you get stressed it seems your photo of birds trying to relax me a bit.
item.content:encoded:
when I see the butterfly, I didn’t think it is a butterfly.
I thought it was some small dinosaur or T-rex is opening its mouth, showing its teeth. haha. different point of view I guess.

anyway, cool blog, mixing birds and code all over the place. if you get stressed it seems your photo of birds trying to relax me a bit.
